description: This file defines a mock class Store2NotificationMock for testing purposes. It inherits from the IStore2::INotification interface and utilizes Google Mock to mock the ValueChanged method, which likely notifies when a value changes in a storage system.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the IStore2::INotification interface for testing, providing a mocked ValueChanged method.

methods.name: ~Store2NotificationMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the mock class.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mocked method to simulate the notification that a value has changed in storage, used for testing purposes.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))
